QuestData.Title: Pollen Power
QuestData.Description: The botani use monstrous insect-like creatures to pollinate their bloom.$b$bThe pollen they carry has a number of powerful properties that would be of use to your garrison forces.$b$bIf you bring me a reserve of this pollen I should be able to convert it to something of value.
QuestData.RewardText: Keep this up and we'll make a survivalist out of you yet.
